column4: okay just out of curiosity, It's been three days since I got introduced to Linux / Ubuntu, what is sudo mean, where can I get a simple guide to installing and running applications, I really don't think  Depending on IRC support is the Ideal way to solve all problems.
can normal people also learn the Linux Lingo or is there a secret society?
I'm pretty sure there are many sites that can explain if you typed "What is Sudo" on google.
Why dont you just install lampp? its sooo much easier. Comes with apache/php/phpmyadmin/mysql/mercury mail/filezilla
